label: Associate HR
opening: Welcome to the HR Associate interview. Please briefly introduce yourself.

role_intro_gate.question: Before we begin, can you explain what you understand about the role of {role} at Knowcraft?
role_intro_gate.end_if_no: Thank you for your time. Our team will be contact you.

questions.text: Do you have experience screening resumes for open positions?
How many years of experience do you have in resume screening?
questions.note: For information only. Not used for rejection.

questions.text: Have you assisted someone else in screening resumes or observed the process closely?
What key factors do you check while shortlisting a resume for an HR role?
followups: How do you assess cultural fit from a resume?
How do you check employment gaps?

questions.text: Explain the complete recruitment cycle from job posting to offer release.
followups: How do you coordinate with hiring managers?
How do you manage multiple open roles at the same time?

questions.text: What documents are usually collected during employee onboarding?
followups: How do you ensure documentation compliance?
What is your role in background verification?

questions.text: How do you track employee leave and attendance?
followups: Have you used any HRMS tools?
How would you resolve attendance discrepancies?

questions.text: Describe a situation where you handled an employee query or concern.
followups: How did you communicate with the employee?

questions.text: What steps are involved in the employee exit or separation process?
followups: How is full and final settlement handled?
What role does HR play in exit interviews?

questions.text: How would you help improve employee engagement in a growing organization?
followups: Can you give an example of an engagement activity?
How would you measure engagement success?
